title: Workshop on Designing Social Education Games Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental game mechanics and practical experience in social sector work
context.additional_context: A competency-building course in designing social sector educational games for in-service professionals, creating practical outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core principles of gamification (goal-rule-feedback system) to instructional design.
Learners can design a digital game prototype (storyboard/wireframe) aligned with social studies learning topics.
Learners can plan an asynchronous game-based learning module operable in an LMS environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
